snippet: LAPEYROLERIE-TORIAN--Dr. Michele Marie, 62, resident of New York City, and a lifelong dedicated resident of Montclair, NJ peacefully entered into eternal rest surrounded by her loving husband, G. Douglas Torian, Jr. on Tuesday, April 5, 2016. Visitation will be Monday, April 11, from 6 to 8pm at Martin's Home for Service, Inc., 48 Elm St., Montclair, with service Tuesday, April 12, at St. Paul Baptist Church, 119 Elm St., Montclair, beginning 11am. She practiced Dentistry in Montclair for many years. Michele was predeceased by: her father: Dr. Frank M. Lapeyroerie, her brother: Dr. Jacques B. Lapeyrolerie, and her mother: Delia D. Lapeyrolerie. Michele leaves to cherish her memory; her husband: G. Douglas Torian, Jr. brother: Dr. Daryl Lapeyrolerie- (Jacqueline), sister: Dr. Donna Lapeyrolerie-Johnson (Dr. Brian Johnson), sister: Crystal Lapeyrolerie, sister-in- law: Lauren Lapeyrolerie, uncle: Raymond Riddle, aunt: Dionne Lapeyrolerie, nieces/nephews: Erika Lapeyrolerie-Richardson (Gabriel Richardson), Jacques R. Lapeyrolerie, B. Bradley Johnson, Danielle Johnson, Kamika Lapeyrolerie and Kortney Lapeyrolerie. www.martinshfs.com 1/3
